meeting_request.purpose: Struggling to keep up with advanced Romance Languages courses
meeting_request.description: Hi, my name is Gary Andrade and I'm a second-year Romance Languages major. Last semester was really tough for me — I took a bunch of Romance courses, including “Romantic Poetry and Prose”, “The Romantic Revolution”, and “Romanticism and Modernity”, and I ended up falling behind and feeling overwhelmed. This semester, I’m taking “Romanticism and Literary Theory” and “Romanticism and Film”, and I’m worried that I’ll be even more behind than last time. I’m still really enjoying Romance, but I’m starting to feel like I’m not cut out for these kinds of courses yet, and I’m worried I’ll fall behind again if I don’t work hard. I want to talk to someone about how to stay on track in these courses and whether I’m doing enough to succeed this semester.
